text: Mizancı Murat Bey (1854–1917) was an Ottoman monarchist, democrat, historian and statesman, who was renowned for his work on reviving the concept of Ottomanism during the Second Constitutional Era.https://www.beyaztarih.com/ansiklopedi/mizanci-murat Early portrait == References == Category:1854 births Category:1917 deaths Category:People from Dagestan
title: Mizancı Murat
